titleInfo.title: A counterexample to Kleitman's conjecture concerning an edge-isoperimetric problem

mods.abstract: Kleitman's conjecture concerning the 'Kleitman-West problem' is false for 3-element subsets.

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Ahlswede, Rudolf, and Cai, Ning. 1999. “A counterexample to Kleitman's conjecture concerning an edge-isoperimetric problem”. Combinatorics, Probability and Computing 8 (4): 301-305.
